message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an introductory price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a slightly reduced rate compared to its market value of $10,000. I believe this offer presents a great value for you while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but that price is a little steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $7,000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value I receive for the sale and the value you seek for the purchase. I hope this proposal aligns better with your budget while still allowing for a satisfactory transaction. Please let me know if you are able to accept this offer.
I appreciate the movement, Alice. To be completely transparent, my budget tops out at $8,000.  If you're willing to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal today.
